Issue.creator: awjh-ibm
Issue.summary: When using transaction annotation parameters, transaction decorator overrides param decorator
Issue.description: If the chaincode tsconfig does not set "emitDecoratorMetadata" then the parameters are not included as no parameter types can be found. Even if a user uses the `@param` annotation the parameter array is still empty as `@transaction` overwrites it. This is unless `@param` is put before `@transaction` then it works as expected.
